title: Star guardian Ahri figure
body: Aren't those supposed to be shipped out soon? I believe they said they'd start coming around Jan 10th but I can't remember. Just curious because I'd really like to get mine. x;

replies.body: You should have gotten an email letting you know when it shipped, but if you're curious you can always shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our billing team to check up on it!
